title: Liz Truss – 2021 Comments on the Global Investment Summit
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Liz Truss, the Secretary of State for International Trade, on 27 March 2021.
content:
The UK was one of the first governments in the world to set a net zero target by 2050 and we are still leading the global shift to clean economic growth.
